Question: Poen Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Poen

Product: EV Battery Pack Remanufacturing Process

- Acquires used EV battery packs and conducts a comprehensive State of Health (SoH) assessment
- Replaces defective cells with brand new cells, retaining the majority of the value and emissions of the initial pack
- Currently able to process about 2,000 packs per year, targeting 5,000 packs per year in 2025
- Works primarily with lithium-ion packs sourced from Hyundai and Kia, but can work with any battery cell chemistry
- Estimates that about 80% of the packs can be remanufactured
- Remanufactured packs can be used in stationery, energy storage applications, or recycled

充电电池组再制造工艺流程

- 收购已使用的电动车电池组并进行全面的健康状况（SoH）评估
- 用全新电池细胞替换有缺陷的细胞，保留初始电池组的大部分价值和排放量
- 目前每年能处理约2,000套电池组，并计划在2025年达到每年5,000套电池组的处理数量目标
- 主要与现代和起亚采购的锂离子电池组合作，但也可与任何电池细胞化学组合合作
- 估计约80%的电池组可进行再制造处理
- 再制造的电池组可用于固定式和能量储存应用，或进行回收利用
